member.name: T:ImageChart.Bar
member.summary: A measurable value represented as a bar.

member.name: P:ImageChart.Bar.Value
member.summary: The value to represent as a bar.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.SetTitle(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the title of the chart, appearing at the top.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.SetTextColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets the color of the labels on the chart.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.SetBackgroundColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets the color of the chart background.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.SetBarColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets the default color of the bars on the chart.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.SetMin(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the lower bound of the chart.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.SetMax(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the upper bound of the chart.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.SetBars(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ImageChart.Bar})
member.summary: Sets the items to display on the chart.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.AddBar(ImageChart.Bar)
member.summary: Adds an item to display on the chart.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.AddBars(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ImageChart.Bar})
member.summary: Adds the items to display on the chart.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.SetFontFamily(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the font to the indicated installed font.
member.param: The name of the font family.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.SetFont(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the font to the font file.
member.param: The path to the font file.

member.name: M:ImageChart.BarChartBuilder.Build(System.String)
member.summary: Builds the specified chart and writes it to a file in the implied format. Supported formats: BMP, JPEG, GIF, PNG
member.param: The output path including file name.
